html:
12.17.17  5:45 pm   12.16.17  6:38 pm But I meant the video "history of the world"

     that's not what i would consider comprehensive

12.17.17  3:36 pm   What do you think of yourself as? Musician, comedian, web personality, etc

     (answer)

12.17.17  3:33 pm   Are you considering doing any more acedemic videos? Not just history, but maybe book synopses or even explaining science and math concepts? 

     if any one is calling my videos 'academic' then i'd say that's a red flag that i need to try to make them less academic

12.17.17  3:31 pm   What are block chords? 

     i guess it's just like when u play all the notes at exactly the same time? other wise it would be more of a sprinkle chord i guess

12.17.17  3:21 pm   Do you have a Bob Dylan poster in the top left corner of your room?

     how do u figure out which corner of a room is the top left

12.17.17  2:37 pm   do u have any other examples of things in music you don't tend to notice until it's pointed out to you, then you can never un-notice it? (examples: the splice at 1:00 in strawberry fields, the rebel acoustic guitar player playing Emaj instead of Emin in hey ya)

     some of the vocal regions were carelessly cut a bit too short (on the left end) in ellie goulding "burn", particularly in the first verse, nearly sabotaging the word 'cuz'

12.17.17  2:07 pm   what is time?

     you

12.17.17  1:56 pm   I know you're probably getting a lot of questions about this.. but can you explain the whole net neutrality thing to me?

     no

      I don't really understand it.

     everyone is in a sad miserable state of panic, and you should be too

      I know it's a way for The Big Important Corporations to make more money, but how will this affect me when I just go on the internet to look stuff up or listen to music or whatever? The internet still seems to be exactly the same to me right now. Isn't there something like the Big Important Websites will run really fast, but the smaller privately made/run sites wont?

     i think it will just go back to the way it was before 2015, which as i'm sure you remember was miserable and terrible

      I keep on hearing about how this whole thing is supposed to be really bad, but I don't get it. Will it affect billwurtz.com?? 

     i don't know, but i'm sure someone will respond to this with a lecture about how i am supposed to be really sad and preparing for the end of the world and so forthe, which i promise i will do when i get a chance but i just haven't gotten around to it yet

12.17.17  1:49 pm   What makes you happy :)? What makes you sad :(? 

     i am happy and sad at the same time

12.17.17  1:26 pm   I'd like to ask, can I ask if I'm allowed to ask you a question? 

     ah, thanks for asking. but did you ask first if you can ask this question

12.17.17  1:09 pm   12.16.17  1:24 pm
Are you truly an orphan or was that a non-serious answer to the question?

     it was correct in context of the question

12.17.17  1:07 pm   please add a chords section to your site

     most of the sections have chords in them already

12.17.17  1:00 pm   Are you aware that your next video will be your 400th video on YouTube?

     i wouldn't be so sure

12.17.17  12:52 pm   What do you think of rhyming the words that aren't at the end of a line or having every word rhyme with something else?

     it all depends on how it sounds and feels

     Have you ever tried something like that?

     sure

12.17.17  12:20 pm   Isn't capitalism good or bad? 

     yes, and maybe more

12.17.17  11:44 am   why do you play invisible drums

     because i am in the library

12.17.17  9:04 am   Do you think that having a background in playing drums and having a good sense of rhythm/timing from music helps you with the timing of your videos (syncing all the text and images up perfectly to the music/lyrics)? 

     oh hell yeah. it's unfair, i keep thinking i should be sent to jail by now

12.17.17  7:58 am   Why is your house a mess in all your videos

     because it is a mess in real life. i use cameras that are able to capture the mess accurately, and portray it on your screen

12.17.17  3:53 am   Would you ever use electric guitar feedback in a song?

     sure

12.17.17  3:09 am   does soap tips count as a research video?

     no

12.17.17  2:33 am   as a beginner piano learner would it be better for me to learn chords first or melodies first?

     try learning them both at the same time. also i just remembered there is a lot of stuff that is kind of a chord and kind of not. maybe try learning that stuff first? as long as you are having fun. if it's not fun enough you could also try setting the instrument on fire. i hope that helps

12.17.17  2:11 am   what's your favourite pattern

     which ever one i most recently discovered

12.17.17  2:01 am   Why you answer less questions these days. Please answer more

     some people think i answer too many questions. some people think i don't answer enough questions. as a compromise, i've decided to answer a medium amount of questions

12.17.17  1:49 am   Why does the weekend go by so quickly?

     because it is shorter than the other portion of the week, which you may be more accustomed to

12.17.17  12:59 am   12.15.17  10:07 pm do you have an opinion about that whole religion thing he did, whatever that was(probably not a big deal)
-dixjxn

     12.15.16  7:20 am

12.16.17  9:21 pm   Combustion, thoughts?

     seems legit

12.16.17  8:55 pm   will u release more merch stuff

     oh hell yeah

12.16.17  8:33 pm   is being bamboozled a good or bad thing to you

     it has never happpened so far, knock on wood

12.16.17  8:33 pm   I've lived my entire life so far without ever needing to use a bucket, and I don't see how that is going to change any time soon. Have you used a bucket recently?

     no but i actually needed one, but i don't have it

      What are some situations that might require a bucket? 

     coin collecting

12.16.17  7:43 pm   what are some strategies to defuse an unpleasant, fruitless argument

     create some kind of diversion

12.16.17  7:21 pm   does other peoples negativity sadden or disappoint you?

     fairly often

     i do

12.16.17  6:38 pm   After hotewig, how did you react when you remembered you had already made a comprehensive history of the world video?

     i already knew it during production and before. it was conprehensive but it mainly included japan. so history of the entire world was a necessary expansion, to include some more non-japan things

12.16.17  6:35 pm   Are you working on another history video?

     no

     And if you are what is it about?

12.16.17  5:55 pm   will there be any more designs for yout t-shirts?

     oh hell yeah

      if so, when?

     soon

12.16.17  4:52 pm   have you made any exciting new gear purchases recently?

     yes i got new underwear

12.16.17  3:41 pm   What should my religion be?

     ask any church (they will tell you it should be theirs)

12.16.17  2:36 pm   What do you use to record that voice ?

     a microphone

12.16.17  1:59 pm   Are you particularly moral? I'm not curious if you are 'good' or 'evil', but if you act with some sense of justice or personal morals in mind.

     it is hopefully a little more than just 'personal'

12.16.17  1:53 pm   how to i end my crippling depression

     how did it start

12.16.17  1:24 pm   who is yours instagrandma? 

     i am an orphan

12.16.17  1:08 pm   Have you ever worried you are too inspirational?

     i kind of like living on the edge

12.16.17  1:02 pm   why is instagram on your "other" and your "other other" pages

     i moved it from the 'other other' page to the 'other' page. if you are still seeing it on the 'other other' page, refresh the page and you will see the new 'other other' page

12.16.17  12:28 pm   How do you feel about Net Neutrality Being Repealed?

     it seems like just yesterday it was installed

12.16.17  12:23 pm   Are you ever gonna consider bringing back the cool effect you used for 'I was wondering how to feel"

     oh boy i've got some news for you

12.16.17  10:43 am   Is it good to intake content differently than its creator(s) original intent. In other words if one were to watch a television show out of order to get a better understanding, would that be wronging or doing a disservice to anyone?

     if they think you have wronged or disserviced them then they usually have to file a claim and then after 30 days if you don't apologize it may go to the supreme court. for example, currently there is actually a class action lawsuit against 100 million people for watching star wars in the wrong order

12.16.17  10:23 am   That Face When You Want To Make Music For The Rest Of Your Life But You Can't Make A Living Off Of It Because That Would Be Unrealistic So You Have To Get A Job So You Can Support Your Passion But You Aren't Really That Good At Anything Other Than Music So You Go "Oh Boy Hash Dangit What Do I Do Now??"

     start playing in some wedding bands, that will be helpful and useful. don't consider that your main music, consider that your job, which you happen to have great skills for. it pays better and has much better hours than many normal jobs. the trick is don't treat it like making money from your passion, think of it as getting a separate job to support your passion which you happen to be great at. bonus you will also surely learn things along the way

12.16.17  10:15 am   will you keep doing videos with 1 minute or more? it's amazing

     oh hell yeah

12.16.17  7:40 am   Aren't words cool? 

     yes

12.16.17  1:07 am   Why do people refer to your videos as "meme videos"?

     the word 'meme' means thing. so if you put things in your videos, then congratulations, that's a meme video

     i'm not sure
